explains: v. 咬；抓住；刺进；欺骗（bite 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: He has the irritating habit of biting his nails.
sentences.cn: 他有咬指甲的讨厌习惯。

sentences.en: The dog was biting, growling and wagging its tail.
sentences.cn: 那条狗咬着叫着，还摇着尾巴。

sentences.en: Boulding was known for his biting wit.
sentences.cn: 博尔丁以其嘲讽式的风趣而出名。
